resources.string:
Select your base theme under the Style Specific Overlays according to your Framework selection e.g Marshmallow Dark with Dark base theme, Framework must be enabled. 

 [Optional] ThemeReady flashable zip by David Wilson & TBO http://goo.gl/UREU82
